price: Nokorɛ, adekyeɛ no mu deɛ, mmerɛ tenten wɔ hɔ ma wo a wobɛtumi de adi wo dwuma.
arabic: إِنَّ لَكَ فِي ٱلنَّهَارِ سَبۡحٗا طَوِيلٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: inna laka fī al-nahāri sabḥan ṭawīlan
